title: Mary (name)
summary: Mary /ˈmɛəˌri/ is a feminine given name, the English form of the name Maria, which was in turn a Latin form of the Greek name Μαρία (María), found in the New Testament.  Both variants reflect Syro-Aramaic Maryam, itself a variant of the Hebrew name  מִרְיָם or Miryam.[1]
